title: system adjustment
body:
^^  Hello Guys, how is everyone .... i am having a major issue. i started The game and it when into some loading screen with the big LOL Logo and it doesn't go pass that . i delete and re installed the game again and is still doing that.
{{champion:60}}  The Logo looks active with the blue loading circle... please help.. and thanks !!!

replies.body: The logo appearing without the patcher can happen if an adjustment in your settings blocks it from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix this up.
